body_html:
From what I can tell, the cmake only works on GPU on windows. So if you could get those fixes as PR once you're done that would be terrific.

Could you show how the compiler is called? IIRC, it's make VERBOSE=1. Then we can cross-check against the blaze command-line.
body_text:

body:
From what I can tell, the cmake only works on GPU on windows. So if you could get those fixes as PR once you're done that would be terrific.

Could you show how the compiler is called? IIRC, it's make VERBOSE=1. Then we can cross-check against the blaze command-line.
